page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: In recent years the farming scene has changed considerably in our area.Most of the small farms have been sold,the farm houses being bought by professional people who work in Chesterfield,Sheffield or Matlock.The farm land has been sold to other farmers or to co-operatives.Of the remaining working farms,the majority are arable combined with fat-stock rearing.There are a few dairy farms,only one of which has a herd producing Channel milk.Almost all the land is well maintained with much silage being made.Some corn is grown but the small fields do not readily lend themselves to large scale production.Much hay is made,potatoes crop well and there is a large area of meadowland.
